jyVis.graphics
Class VisualizationPrimitiveIndex

java.lang.Object
  jyVis.graphics.VisualizationPrimitiveIndex

public class VisualizationPrimitiveIndex
extends java.lang.Object

Indexes visualization primitives for efficient selection and mouse interaction.

Author:
Curran Kelleher
